attributes.action: get rid of the e-Petition team since they have no respect for democracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Seriously guys, I can't believe you. Totally ignoring my petition which was valid and trying to tell me one already exists that is similar is insane. It has no similiarity. This Government has no respect, I will be taking this up further.

I have no respect for this country, so I shall leave and move to America. I will return once I'm happy with the way this country is governed.

rejection.details: Please send details of your complaint to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
